casebody.data:
SMITHKLINE BEECHAM CORPORATION, dba GlaxoSmithKline, et al., petitioners,
v.
KING DRUG COMPANY OF FLORENCE, INC., et al. No. 15-1055. Supreme Court of the United States June 6, 2016. The Solicitor General is invited to file a brief in this case expressing the views of the United States.
